root: ^Yes. But a cozy store too, isn't it?
^Well, it's your first day, so I don't want to give you anything too much to do.
^Now that you know where everything is, how about you start by helping out some of the customers?
^I'm sure everyone's looking for something specific, and they'd really appreciate you giving them some direction.
^Myrtle might need some help organizing the shelves, too. So be ready to help her with that if it comes up.
^That should be everything for now. Let me know if any issues come up!
^Oh... and one more very important thing.
^Do not go into the supply closet.
